DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate bioavailability vitamin D2 D3 measure increase specific hydroxy form serum ( 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 , respectively , total 25 ( OH ) D .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Bioefficacy Vitamin D2 Vitamin D3
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Human volunteer receive supplement contain either vitamin D2 D3 period 8 week . At baseline , 4 week 8 week , 25 ( OH ) D2 , 25 ( OH ) D3 total 25 ( OH ) D measure serum main outcome variable . Additional outcome variable Ca concentration serum , PTH concentration serum , ambulatory blood pressure heart rate , renin expression peripheral mononuclear cell . Groups/Cohorts Assigned Interventions 1 . Placebo group 2 . Vitamin D2-group Daily treatment vitamin d2-supplements ( contain 2000 IU per capsule ) 3 . Vitamin D3-group Daily treatment vitamin d3-supplements ( contain 2000 IU per capsule )
DOC.criteria: 18 year healthy supplementation vitamin calcium hypercalcemia hypercalciuria chronical illness ( diabetes , kidney disease , cardiovascular disease ) serumcreatinine 115 mmol/l pregnancy breastfeed woman
